direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manage enforced attributes for tags, but in opposite directions (adding vs. removing).
Both methods involve adding attributes to tags, with similar control flows and validation checks.
Both methods handle attributes for tags but in opposite directions (adding enforced attributes vs. removing attributes).
Both methods involve managing attributes related to protocols or enforced values, though for different purposes.
